div.head: 酸重
div.div: a feeling of soreness and heaviness

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: a feeling of soreness and heaviness

sense.def: Illness Sign of a feeling of soreness or deep-seated heaviness affecting the entire body or parts of it. RHZ nao sha 硇砂：丈夫腰胯酸重，四肢不任 , “In males, the lower back and the hips experience a feeling of soreness and heaviness . The four extremities fail to function”.
